mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO organization ( id, tenant_code, org_code, org_name, parent_org_code, short_org_name, org_type, org_level, org_path, data_source, status, remark, version, creator, updater, create_time, update_time, is_delete, `extend` ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.tenantCode}, #{item.orgCode}, #{item.orgName}, #{item.parentOrgCode}, #{item.shortOrgName}, #{item.orgType}, #{item.orgLevel}, #{item.orgPath}, #{item.dataSource}, #{item.status}, #{item.remark}, #{item.version}, #{item.creator}, #{item.updater}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.isDelete}, #{item.extend} )
